Tokens

Tokens are the basic settings for components to build. They include colors, typographic rules, rounded borders sizes and so on.

Typography

Needs documentation, but check assets/stylesheets/tokens.css or the Sketch file.

Spacing

Needs documentation, but check assets/stylesheets/tokens.css or the Sketch file.

Colors

  • var(--color-primary-30)
  • var(--color-primary-50)
